美正式通知聯合國 退出巴黎氣候協定
05 Nov 2019, 07:27 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社華盛頓4日綜合外電報導）美國今天正式通知聯合國，將退出巴黎氣候協定，成為至今唯一退出這項協定的國家。
美國國務卿蓬佩奧（Mike Pompeo）宣布退出消息，這將在一年後生效；他並重申川普總統去年的談話稱，巴黎氣候協定對美國形成了「不公平的經濟負擔」。（譯者：張佑之）1081105

The United States officially notified the United Nations to withdraw from the Paris Climate Agreement
05 Nov 2019, 07:27 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency, Washington, 4th, comprehensive foreign news report) The United States officially notified the United Nations today that it will withdraw from the Paris climate agreement and become the only country that has withdrawn from the agreement so far.
US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo announced the withdrawal, which will take effect one year later; he also reiterated that President Trump’s remark last year stated that the Paris climate agreement had created an “unfair economic burden” for the United States. (Translator: Zhang Youzhi) 1081105
